name: Sanatorium
description:
Quick guide :

You are running from your kidnapper, just press the UP key to accelerate and release it to jump.

Press R to restart the level.

Press A to skip to the next level.

Press Space to pause the game.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Hello there,

I'm here today to present you my very first game made by myself during my first year of studies in Game Design at ETPA in Toulouse.

I've used Phaser, a 2D game engine and done all the job from concept passing by aethetics and programmation alone. 

I've learn a lot during that projet and i'm proud of what i've done heaven if this is not the game of the year :)

Actually i can tell  the only thing that is kind of great in that game is the ambience, in return the tutorial is incomprehensible, the levels are too fast and unreadable, the main mechanic is too simple and not as deep as it could be, and there is a lot and a lot more bad things to say..

Just play and have fun :)
